properties.name: cors.allowed-origins
properties.description: List of origins allowed to access the API (e.g., http://localhost:3000).

properties.name: cors.allowed-methods
properties.description: List of HTTP methods allowed for CORS requests (e.g., GET, POST, PUT, DELETE, OPTIONS).

properties.name: cors.allowed-headers
properties.description: List of HTTP headers allowed in CORS requests (e.g., Authorization, Content-Type).

properties.name: cors.test-origin
properties.description: Single origin URL used for testing CORS configuration. Only used in test environment.

values.description: Allow OPTIONS requests (required for CORS preflight)
